metadata.title: CVE-2024-41149 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:block: avoid to reuse `hctx` not removed from cpuhp callback listIf the 'hctx' isn't removed from cpuhp callback list, we can't reuse it,otherwise use-after-free may be triggered.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of ESM support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of ESM support').
